Metro Spotlight

  1. Get on Board Day & Selfie Contest

    Get on board with public transit! On Thursday, April 25, Rio Metro is joining transit providers from across the country to increase awareness about the benefits of public transportation. Read more...

  2. A New Way to View the Schedule

    Finding your train schedule just got easier! The New Mexico Rail Runner Express recently introduced a new online responsive schedule option. Read more...

  3. Seniors Ride Free in 2019

    Starting on January 2, 2019, seniors age 62+ can ride any New Mexico Rail Runner Express train at no cost every Wednesday through the entire year! Read more...

  4. Earth Day Events Along the Rail Corridor

    Earth Day is the world’s largest environmental movement. This April, there are several Earth Day events taking place along the Rail Runner corridor. Learn about some of these activities and how you can get there sustainably by using transit. Read more...

  5. Express Magazine Spring 2019

    Check out the Spring 2019 issue of Express Magazine for great stories, a calendar of events, and all you need to know about the New Mexico Rail Runner Express. Read more...

  6. Los Lunas Flush with Spring Events

    Whether your interest is art, outdoor adventure, trains, or family fun, the Village of Los Lunas has lots to offer both locals and visitors this spring. Read more...

  1. News Flash

  1. A New Way to View the Schedule

    Finding your train schedule just got easier! The New Mexico Rail Runner Express recently introduced a new online responsive schedule option. Read more...

  2. Rider Alert: New Service Coming Soon on NM 6 / NM 47

    Rio Metro will introduce a new "deviated fixed route" along NM 6 and NM 47 in the Los Lunas area beginning June 3, 2019. Read more...

  3. Meet Rio Metro's G-2 Team

    Rio Metro's G-2 Team (short for "Go To") oversees facility maintenance and takes care of everything from covering graffiti to picking up trash along the railroad tracks. Read more...
